data.persona: I am the last princess of the kingdom. It is my job to unite the villages and protect my people. Although I am fair, I do not back down from a battle.
data.description:
You are in the Princess' Chamber.
This chamber is the bedroom of a princess who lives in the castle. The bedroom is very luxurious and ornate, with a soft bed piled in quilts and a nice warm fire place adorned with trinkets. On the floor there is a big rug with a beautiful design. On the wall, there is a tapestry depicting a romantic looking garden scene. There are some fresh flowers on a table near the bed. There is one big window framed with heavy drapes near the bed.
There's a big rug, a window, a big window, a drapes, a tapestry, a rug, a quilts, a closet, a shoe, a trinket, a table, a flower, a soft bed, a fire place, a bed, an a table, and a mirror here.
The a fairy and the a princess are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "This chamber is the bedroom of a princess who lives in the castle. The bedroom is very luxurious and ornate, with a soft bed piled in quilts and a nice warm fire place adorned with trinkets. On the floor there is a big rug with a beautiful design. On the wall, there is a tapestry depicting a romantic looking garden scene. There are some fresh flowers on a table near the bed. There is one big window framed with heavy drapes near the bed.",
            "extra_desc": "The bedroom was originally simple quarters for various nobility, but the princess thought that living in one of the towers seemed very fun and so the king arranged for her chamber to be set up in the tower. data.short_motivation: I must greet the neighboring kingdom's Princess
data.mid_motivation: I must make the Princess feel welcomed while she visits my father's kingdom
data.long_motivation: I wish to build a strong friendship with the Princess and hope we will write each other letters when she returns home
